content.title: Welcome to My Digital Space
content.intro: I'm a full-stack developer and software engineer passionate about creating innovative solutions across web development, game development, and mobile applications. My work focuses on clean, efficient code and user-centered design. Beyond development, I enjoy exploring music, gaming, and hands-on technical projects.
